title: Introducing: Tom Day
body:
Melbournite **Tom Day** burst onto the ambient scene last year with comedown classics _Who You Want To Be_ and Love Your Life.

Together with **Monsoonsiren** he created precious symphonies with captivating vocals reminiscent of Sigur Ros, albeit without the often intrusive crescendos.

His latest efforts, released via SoundCloud, weave birdsong with delicately crafted melodies to produce idyllic 6am soundtracks. The stand out track _Future Holds_ features tempered breakbeat percussion and consequently renewed vitality.
